sense.gloss: criticizing someone behind their back, backbiting

sdata.j: ↑後↑↓|うし↓ろ↑指↑↓ゆび|↓を↑指↑↓さ↓されるようなことなど、↑決↑↓けっ↓してしていないよ。
sdata.e: I've never done the kind of thing people would talk about behind my back.

sdata.j: ↑後指↑↓|うしろゆび|↓を↑指↑↓さ↓すのはやめたまえ。
sdata.e: Don't talk about people behind their backs.
